Agility.name: Agility
Agility.description: Dodge attacks, move with stealth, perform acrobatics, shoot a bow, pick a pocket.

Fortitude.name: Fortitude
Fortitude.description: Resist poison, shrug off pain, survive in a desert, wear heavy armor.

Might.name: Might
Might.description: Swing a maul, jump over a chasm, break down a door, wrestle a foe to submission.

Learning.name: Learning
Learning.description: Recall facts about history, arcane magic, the natural world, or any information you picked up from an external source.

Logic.name: Logic
Logic.description: Innovate a new crafting method, decipher a code, jury-rig a device, get the gist of a language you don't speak.

Perception.name: Perception
Perception.description: Sense ulterior motives, track someone, catch a gut feeling, spot a hidden foe, find a secret door.

Will.name: Will
Will.description: Maintain your resolve, resist torture, study long hours, stay awake on watch, stave off insanity.

Deception.name: Deception
Deception.description: Tell a lie, bluff at cards, disguise yourself, spread rumors, swindle a sucker.

Persuasion.name: Persuasion
Persuasion.description: Negotiate a deal, convince someone, haggle a good price, pry information.

Presence.name: Presence
Presence.description: Give a speech, sing a song, inspire an army, exert your force of personality, have luck smile upon you.

Alteration.name: Alteration
Alteration.description: Change shape, alter molecular structures, transmute one material into another.

Creation.name: Creation
Creation.description: Channel higher powers, manifest something from nothing, regenerate, divinely bolster.

Energy.name: Energy
Energy.description: Create and control the elementsâ€”fire, cold, electricity.

Entropy.name: Entropy
Entropy.description: Disintegrate matter, kill with a word, create undead, sicken others

Influence.name: Influence
Influence.description: Control the minds of others, speak telepathically, instill fear, create illusory figments, cloak with invisibility.

Prescience.name: Prescience
Prescience.description: See the future, read minds or auras, view from afar, detect magic or evil, communicate with extraplanar entities.

Protection.name: Protection
Protection.description: Protect from damage, break supernatural influence, dispel magic, exile extradimensional beings.
